translations: n.婆罗门；婆罗门牛（Brahman 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Because of the fear of pollution, Brahmans and other high-ranked individuals will not share food with, not eat from the same plate as, not even accept food from an individual from a low-ranking caste.
sentences.translation: 由于害怕污染，婆罗门和其他高种姓的人不会与他人分享食物，不会与他人共用一个盘子，甚至不会接受来自低种姓的人的食物。

sentences.sentence: He saw him growing up to become great wise man and priest, a prince among the Brahmans.
sentences.translation: 他知道他的儿子将会成为一位伟大的智者、一位祭祀、婆罗门中的王子。

sentences.sentence: The Great Brahma Lord has the multitudes of Brahmans and Brahma Ministers supporting him.
sentences.translation: 这大梵天王，有梵众天、梵辅天来拥护他。
